text:
VO2 max is the greatest predictor of lifespan

But Vo2max testing is expensive($150+), and physically challenging

I'm building an app that can estimate your Vo2Max score just with your phone, no wearables needed

cc. @_buildspace @_nightsweekends https://t.co/uo1aEmmUci
